name: IGI Commando Sniper Assassin
description: IGI Commando Sniper Assassin is most realistic game ever you encountered ever. Realistic environment, challenging missions and combat enemies make you the hero. It is interesting and challenging game among all its rival game. There are large number of enemies out there, your mission is to kill them all and clean the Desert Sniper base camp area clear from these enemies of Desert Sniper. You are highly skillful and highly trained Desert Sniper Killer, you love killing your enemies, and you are good at finishing your mission.
